Dear Mr. MULVANY:
Your Court Operated Residential Care Facility certificate of inspection license is
renewed. It is valid only at your present address and is nontransferable. If you move,
please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
You will be receiving the certificate of inspection in the mail. Please review it for accuracy.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Rorie Dodge-Garnaat, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
235 Grand, Ste 1305
P.O. Box 30650
Lansing, MI 48909
(517) 899-6024

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) This is a court operated facility that does not have a contract with the Department
of Health and Human Services.
3.) This is a court operated facility that does not service the plaintiff class covered by
the Modified Implementation, Sustainability, and Exit Plan (MISEP).
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was did not require technical assistance at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not require consultation at this time.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The facility has not been required to submit any corrective action plans this licensing
period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular certificate.
